CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 5 - Right to liberty and security (Article 5-1 - Lawful arrest or detention)

TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE .

CARDINAL . At TIME on DATE the applicant was taken to the organised crime department at the ORG police station and placed in a room ( no . CARDINAL ) under police guard . A record of his arrest was not drawn up . The applicant spent TIME on a mattress in the corridor .
